name: Whack A Quack!
description:
= Synopsis =

In this game, we throw computer mice at ducks (literally)

It's a pretty simplistic games but it is stupid and whacky.

= Duck Types =

We have 3 breeds of ducks:

① Grey ducks - Add 2 points when hit

② Red Ducks - Deduct 3 points

③ Yellow Ducks - Deduct 2 points

= Instructions =

Hit the Grey ducks and don't hit the red or yellow ducks.

= Credits =

Game By MST_Creator (me)

Music by Eric Matyas (Soundimage.org)
